patthana15.21:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
patthana15.21:1.1_0: Because of the dimension of infinite consciousness, the support is not the cause or condition for the arising of thought.
patthana15.21:2.1_0: Because of this quality, the cause of no reason for the sake of seeing the reason.
patthana15.21:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
